segments.text: Hello , this is Lucy from ABC Company . Is this Monica ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am calling to inform you that we have arranged an interview for this accountant position at 2 PM this Thursday afternoon . Please come on time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , thank you . By the way , could you please tell me how I can get there from A community ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , you can take the subway , get off at B stop and walk north for several minutes . You will find a building . It will take about 40 minutes in total .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got it . Thank you so much .
segments.speaker: S2
